kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'https://hr.dudee-indeed.com/th/login'.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//*[@id="__layout"]/div/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[2]/span'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.arg: text=ลืมรหัสผ่าน
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dudeeindeed.pt' into text field '//*[@id="__layout"]/div/div[2]/div/div/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/div[1]/div/div[2]/div/input'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="__layout"]/div/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div[1]/span' contains exact text 'ภาพรวมพนักงาน'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
